title: 2 Quick Ways to Remove Labels (Folders) from Your Gmail

steps.title: Go to https://mail.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://mail.google.com in a web browser. You can use any web browser to delete labels in Gmail, including Chrome, Safari, and Firefox. You can't delete labels on the Android Gmail app or mobile browser; it must be done from a desktop browser. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Hover your mouse over a label and click ⋮.
steps.content: Hover your mouse over a label and click ⋮ . You'll see a list of your labels on the left side of the page. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Remove label.
steps.content: Click Remove label . This is towards the bottom of the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . The label will be deleted. Keep in mind that the emails won't be deleted , just the categorization.

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. This looks like a multicolored M with a white background. If you aren't already logged into your Gmail account, tap Sign in to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is next to a gear icon at the bottom of the menu. You may need to scroll down to find it. A new page will open with your primary account's settings. If you see the wrong account, return to the inbox. Tap the profile picture in the top-right corner and select the correct email address.

steps.title: Tap Inbox customizations.
steps.content: Tap Inbox customizations . You can find this underneath the Inbox header.

steps.title: Tap Labels.
steps.content: Tap Labels . This is towards the top, underneath Inbox tips .

steps.title: Tap the label you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the label you want to delete. You'll see them listed here.

steps.title: Tap Delete [label].
steps.content: Tap Delete [label] . This is at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . The label will be deleted.
